original_text:
I will not be afraid of many thousands of people
    who have set themselves against me all around.
korean_text: 천만인이 나를 에워싸 진 친다 하여도 나는 두려워하지 아니하리이다

sentences.original_text: I will not be afraid of many thousands of people
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 수천의 사람들을 두렵지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: who have set themselves against me all around
